title: Italian-Inspired King Valley Vineyard Studios with Wine Tasting & Breakfast Hamper
description:
Retreat to this secluded sanctuary, nestled among the rolling hills and rustic charm of the King Valley. Wake up in a luxuriously transformed shipping container, surrounded by uninterrupted lush vineyards, before spending an afternoon exploring the popular wine region.

Relish the la dolce vita lifestyle with the onsite Italian restaurant Trattoria Dining and discover the estateâ€™s Cellar Door just steps away from your studio. Then, when the sun comes down, cosy up next to the fire pit with a bottle of wine, gazing at the country-clear sky.

title: Italian-Inspired Victoria High Country Winery Hideaway with Breakfast Hamper & Wine Tasting
description:
Escape to this secluded, sustainable sanctuary, a hidden gem cradled within King Valley's undulating landscape and rustic charm. Here, industrial meets idyllic as luxuriously appointed shipping containers transform into designer havens. Large windows frame sweeping views of verdant vineyards that stretch as far as the eye can see.

Relish the dolce vita lifestyle at Trattoria Dining for authentic Italian flavours that dance on your palate and discover the estate's intimate Cellar Door just steps away from your studio. As twilight falls, gather around the crackling firepit with a wine in hand while a blanket of stars unfurls above.

Nestled in Victoria's breathtaking King Valley wine-growing region, this property is at the heart of a gourmand's paradise. Meander through family-owned vineyards, sample award-winning prosecco, or venture further to discover hidden waterfalls and mountain trails.
